location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 4 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Councils at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter notes that Beaumont and Green had received a packet from Bussora [Basra] for onwards passage to Bombay and confirms they will send the packet by dow leaving 'today or tomorrow'. The letter encloses a copy of Bushire's latest message to Bombay and the monthly accounts for June. Shipped by boat.
